016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.Collections;
022import java.util.HashMap;
023
024/**
025 * A lipid species is the factual root of the object hierarchy. Lipid category
026 * and class are used as taxonomic roots of a lipid species. Partial structural
027 * knowledge, apart from the head group, is first encoded in the lipid species.
028 *
029 * A typical lipid species is PC 32:0 (SwissLipids SLM:000056493), where the
030 * head group is defined as PC (Glycerophosphocholines), with fatty acyl chains
031 * of unknown individual composition, but known total composition (32 carbon
032 * atoms, zero double bonds, no hydroxylations or other functions).
033 *
034 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
035 * @author Nils Hoffmann
036 */
037public class LipidSpecies {
038
039    protected Headgroup headGroup;
040    protected LipidSpeciesInfo info;
041
042    protected HashMap<String, FattyAcid> fa = new HashMap<>();
043    protected ArrayList<FattyAcid> faList = new ArrayList<>();
044
045    public LipidSpecies(Headgroup _headgroup, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
046        this(_headgroup, Collections.emptyList(), knownFunctionalGroups);
047    }
048
049    public LipidSpecies(Headgroup _headGroup, Collection<FattyAcid> _fa, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
050        headGroup = _headGroup;
051
052        info = new LipidSpeciesInfo(headGroup.getLipidClass(), knownFunctionalGroups);
053        info.setLevel(LipidLevel.SPECIES);
054
055        // add fatty acids
056        if (_fa != null && !_fa.isEmpty()) {
057            int i = 0;
058            FattyAcid fattyAcid = _fa.iterator().next();
059            boolean fa_it = (_fa.size() > 0) && (fattyAcid.lipidFaBondType == LipidFaBondType.LCB_EXCEPTION || fattyAcid.lipidFaBondType == LipidFaBondType.LCB_REGULAR);
060            for (FattyAcid fatty_acid : _fa) {
061                fatty_acid.name = (fa_it && i == 0) ? "LCB" : "FA" + String.valueOf(i + 1 - (fa_it ? 1 : 0));
062                fatty_acid.position = -1;
063                info.add(fatty_acid);
064                ++i;
065            }
066        }
067    }
068
069    public LipidLevel getLipidLevel() {
070        return LipidLevel.SPECIES;
071    }
072
073    public LipidSpeciesInfo getInfo() {
074        return info;
075    }
076
077    public Headgroup getHeadGroup() {
078        return headGroup;
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Returns the normalized lipid string on the native level.
083     *
084     * @return the normalized lipid string.
085     */
086    public String getLipidString() {
087        return getLipidString(LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL);
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Returns the normalized lipid string on the provided level.
092     *
093     * @param level the lipid level at which the lipid string should be
094     * generated.
095     * @return the normalized lipid string.
096     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when the provided level is not
097     * supported.
098     */
099    public String getLipidString(LipidLevel level) {
100        switch (level) {
101            case UNDEFINED_LEVEL ->
102                throw new IllegalArgumentException("LipidSpecies does not know how to create a lipid string for level " + level.toString());
103            case CLASS, CATEGORY -> {
104                return headGroup.getLipidString(level);
105            }
106            case NO_LEVEL, SPECIES -> {
107                StringBuilder lipid_string = new StringBuilder();
108                lipid_string.append(headGroup.getLipidString(level));
109
110                if (info.getElements().get(Element.C) > 0 || info.numCarbon > 0) {
111                    LipidSpeciesInfo lsi = info.copy();
112                    for (HeadgroupDecorator decorator : headGroup.getDecorators()) {
113                        if (decorator.getName().equals("decorator_alkyl") || decorator.getName().equals("decorator_acyl")) {
114                            ElementTable e = decorator.computeAndCopyElements();
115                            lsi.numCarbon += e.get(Element.C);
116                            lsi.doubleBonds.setNumDoubleBonds(lsi.doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds() + decorator.getNDoubleBonds());
117                        }
118                    }
119                    lipid_string.append(headGroup.getLipidCategory() != LipidCategory.ST ? " " : "/").append(lsi.toString());
120                }
121                return lipid_string.toString();
122            }
123            default ->
124                throw new IllegalArgumentException("LipidSpecies does not know how to create a lipid string for level " + level.toString());
125        }
126    }
127
128    public String getExtendedClass() {
129        boolean special_case = (info.numCarbon > 0) ? (headGroup.getLipidCategory() == LipidCategory.GP) : false;
130        String class_name = headGroup.getClassName();
131        if (special_case && (info.extendedClass == LipidFaBondType.ETHER_PLASMANYL || info.extendedClass == LipidFaBondType.ETHER_UNSPECIFIED)) {
132            return class_name + "-O";
133        } else if (special_case && info.extendedClass == LipidFaBondType.ETHER_PLASMENYL) {
134            return class_name + "-P";
135        }
136
137        return class_name;
138    }
139
140    public ArrayList<FattyAcid> getFaList() {
141        return faList;
142    }
143
144    @JsonIgnore
145    public ElementTable getElements() {
146
147        switch (info.getLevel()) {
148            case COMPLETE_STRUCTURE, FULL_STRUCTURE, STRUCTURE_DEFINED, SN_POSITION, MOLECULAR_SPECIES, SPECIES -> {
149            }
150            default ->
151                throw new LipidException("Element table cannot be computed for lipid level " + info.getLevel().toString());
152        }
153
154        if (headGroup.isUseHeadgroup()) {
155            throw new LipidException("Element table cannot be computed for lipid level " + info.getLevel().toString());
156        }
157
158        ElementTable elements = headGroup.getElements();
159        elements.add(info.getElements());
160
161        // since only one FA info is provided, we have to treat this single information as
162        // if we would have the complete information about all possible FAs in that lipid
163        LipidClassMeta meta = LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headGroup.getLipidClass());
164
165        int additional_fa = meta.possibleNumFa;
166        int remaining_H = meta.maxNumFa - additional_fa;
167        int hydrochain = meta.specialCases.contains("HC") ? 1 : 0;
168
169        elements.put(Element.O, elements.get(Element.O) - (-additional_fa + info.numEthers + (headGroup.isSpException() ? 1 : 0) + hydrochain));
170        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + (-additional_fa + remaining_H + 2 * info.numEthers + 2 * hydrochain));
171
172        if (meta.specialCases.contains("Amide")) {
173            elements.put(Element.O, elements.get(Element.O) - meta.maxNumFa);
174            elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + meta.maxNumFa);
175        }
176        return elements;
177    }
178
179}
